data.content: SnapChat is one of my most used apps, it is lots of fun and a great way to keep in contact with friends/family. It's amazing how you can share things onto your story instead of sending it to everyone but you can also block people from seeing your story! Its hilarious seeing the filters and people's bitmoji's, and you can even read the latest news on Buzzfeed, Comedy Central, The Sun and so on. SnapChat even has its own game sort of, named 'streaks' all you need to do is SnapChat someone everyday and they must SnapChat you everyday and by the time you get to doing that for 3 days a number 3 will appear beside their name and the number will get bigger everyday! The only thing that I think SnapChat should have is a button that sends to all of your streaks because that would take a lot quicker. I truly recommend SnapChat as its a well protected app and is a great app too.
data.title: Great App!

data.content:
Hey, I use Snapchat a LOT, daily. Its really good, really fun to use for chatting and sending stuff on. The only problems i have with it is that: 1) 

it takes up wayyy too much storage. It takes up at least 1GB of memory and I keep having to reinstall it to free up that space again. 

2) The other problem I have with it, is that it takes up a crap load of battery when you use it too, you could be at 100% and at 40% by the time you have opened snapchat for 5-10 minutes, which I believe is absurd. Sometimes you have to turn your phone off and on again so the battery comes back. 

3) The new bitmoji thing is really annoying and cringey as heck

But apart from those, the app is pretty good.

data.content:
Dear Snapchat,

You guys have done a great job over these past few years with developing this app and updating it frequently with innovative ideas. I think the next step for you guys is to improve the recording of video with audio casted from a Bluetooth connection. I'm sure you guys are aware that you cannot maintain the connection whilst recording on Snapchat. Competitors such as Instagram have achieved this so I think it should be at the top of your developer's list of priorities come the next update. Keep up the great work!
